prompt_base: hyperdetailed portrait of an elegant celestial being, tall stature, pale light-blue skin tone, impossibly tall vertical white hair structure, serene intelligent eyes, wearing a regal maroon silk garment, gold neck ring
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, soft cinematic rim lighting, hyperrealistic texture on the silk fabric, delicate subsurface scattering on the pale skin, detailed structure of the white hair, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, CGI, plastic texture, smooth skin, helmet hair, blurry hair, humanoid proportions, human ears, flat lighting, low quality
